Overview¶

Dashboard provides the base class for dashboards in the EDC. It handles the dashboard type, model and id along with a few other values that are used by bhp_base_admin to return a model edited in admin to the dashboard. URLs are generated by the class.

See also

bhp_dashboard_registered_subject and the local dashboard app within the EDC deployment.
